AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.MainText1: Hello! My name is Andrey Pozdnyakov, I am 36 years old, front-end developer, engineer and father of 2 sons :) Currently live and work in Kazan. I am involved in the development of various projects using React.js, Typescript, etc. More details about my projects can be found in the section
AboutMe.MainText2: I have a large work experience in a team (more than 14 years), including in an English-speaking team. I also have work experience (more than 3 years) as a team leader of 5-6 people and the performing various projects
AboutMe.MoreInfo: More information about me you can see in my VideoCV

Skills.Title: My skills
Skills.UsedFeatures: What I use in my work:

Experience.Title: My work experience - 14+ years
Experience.WorkXP1Text: Developer of interactive teaching material (Ministry of culture, Republic of Tatarstan)
Experience.WorkXP2Text: Senior Commissioning and Testing Engineer (Kazan Helicopters Plant, JSC)
Experience.Education6: Various advanced training courses on aviation technological topics
Experience.Languages2Text: I had been on a business trip to India for 14 months, worked as part of a warranty & maintenance team.

Projects.Title: My projects
Projects.Project1Info: Kanban is an application with extensive possibilities for creating and managing boards.
Projects.Project2Info: RS Lang is an application for learning foreign words, including an electronic textbook with a database of words to learn, mini-games for repeating them and statistics page for tracking individual progress.
Projects.Project3Info: WELCOME TO THE LOUVRE. From the castle to the museum
Projects.Project4Info: A clock made in JavaScript that shows the current local time and date.
